snippet: The New York Times and Siena College asked voters in New York City about their attitudes toward Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and the candidates who want to replace him.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times and Siena College asked voters in New York City about their attitudes toward Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and the candidates who want to replace him.

headline.seo: New York Times Poll on the Mayor’s Race
headline.main: Voters on the Mayor, the City, and the Campaign
